title: Please help Identify this Font
content:
Please help identify this font. I have been searching using the F's as a reference but unsuccessful. It is similar to the Feel font.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lipologo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131522/http:/typophile.com/files/lipologo.jpg) | 44.78 KB |
author: phelpschal

comments.content:
Can someone please tell me the name of this font and how I can get it? Thanks, Peter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unknown%20font%20name_4635.jpg)

[http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname\_zps2183f7...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131522/http:/i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname_zps2183f77c.jpg "http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname\_zps2183f77c.jpg")

How come Grebäck's fonts are free on Dafont but not free on his site?

hhp

Thanks folks. That was quick.

Do you know what these fonts are? Both the one with the special A's and the script font.

[http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname2\_zps8f744...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131522/http:/i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname2_zps8f74460d.jpg "http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af41/pego99/unknownfontname2\_zps8f74460d.jpg")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011131522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unknown%20font%20name%202_4599.jpg)
Hrant - as Grebäck states on his website (albeit, in hard-to-read fashion), the fonts are free for personal use - but he welcomes a donation.

Actually, looking at Dafont versus his site versus MyFonts, I'm seeing a lot of pricing inconsistency, plus not much "cross-revelation" (like telling people to get it free from Dafont).

So I'm not sure what the best way is to link to his fonts.

hhp
Yep - it's a messy way of doing business - and _not_ doing business.

BTW does MyFonts allow you to sell a font for less (or give it away) elsewhere?

hhp
